statements: SELECT * FROM home_insurance_claims;
SELECT claim_id, policy_number, claim_date FROM home_insurance_claims ORDER BY claim_date ASC;
SELECT claim_id, policy_number, claim_amount FROM home_insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT location, cause_of_loss FROM home_insurance_claims WHERE location='New York';
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, location FROM home_insurance_claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM home_insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, policy_number, cause_of_loss FROM home_insurance_claims WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT policy_number, claim_date, claim_amount FROM home_insurance_claims WHERE cause_of_loss LIKE '%fire%' AND location = 'California';
SELECT * FROM home_insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 2000 ORDER BY policy_number ASC, claim_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM home_insurance_claims WHERE location = 'Texas' AND claim_date >= '2022-01-01' AND claim_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_type FROM insurance_claims ORDER BY claim_id DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_type, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_date > '2021-01-01' AND claim_date < '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM policyholders WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM policyholders ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_type = 'Car' AND claim_amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;

SELECT policyholders.first_name, policyholders.last_name, insurance_claims.claim_amount FROM policyholders JOIN insurance_claims ON policyholders.policy_number = insurance_claims.policy_number WHERE insurance_claims.claim_type = 'Health' AND insurance_claims.claim_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 2000;

SELECT policyholders.first_name, policyholders.last_name, insurance_claims.claim_date FROM policyholders LEFT JOIN insurance_claims ON policyholders.policy_number = insurance_claims.policy_number WHERE insurance_claims.claim_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY policyholders.last_name ASC, policyholders.first_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE policy_number IN (SELECT policy_number FROM policyholders WHERE address LIKE '%New York%') ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;

SELECT claim_id, policyholders.first_name, insurance_claims.claim_type, insurance_claims.claim_amount FROM insurance_claims JOIN policyholders ON insurance_claims.policy_number = policyholders.policy_number WHERE policyholders.phone_number LIKE '%555%' AND insurance_claims.claim_amount > 5000 ORDER BY policyholders.first_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM home_owners;
SELECT name, address FROM home_owners WHERE id = 1;
SELECT claim_id, policy_number, DATE_FORMAT(date_claimed, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT claim_description FROM claims WHERE policy_number = 'P4567';
SELECT * FROM risk_factors WHERE factor_id BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY factor_id DESC;
SELECT name, address, policy_number FROM home_owners;
SELECT name, address, policy_number FROM home_owners WHERE id = 1;
SELECT claim_id, policy_number, date_claimed, claim_amount FROM claims ORDER BY date_claimed DESC;
SELECT h.name, h.address, c.claim_amount FROM home_owners h JOIN claims c ON h.policy_number = c.policy_number;
SELECT c.claim_id, c.claim_amount, r.factor_description FROM claims c LEFT JOIN risk_factors r ON c.claim_id = r.claim_id WHERE c.claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM home_insurance_claims
SELECT claim_id, policy_id, claim_date FROM home_insurance_claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC
SELECT claim_id, claim_type, damage_cost FROM home_insurance_claims WHERE damage_cost > 5000
SELECT policy_id, start_date, end_date FROM policy_details ORDER BY start_date ASC
SELECT claim_id, history_id, claim_date FROM claim_history WHERE resolution_status = 'pending'
SELECT * FROM claim_history WHERE resolution_status = 'pending';
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, damage_cost FROM home_insurance_claims WHERE damage_cost > 5000 ORDER BY damage_cost DESC;

SELECT claim_id, policy_id, claim_date, resolution_status FROM claim_history JOIN home_insurance_claims ON claim_history.claim_id = home_insurance_claims.claim_id WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT property_id, address, building_value, contents_value FROM property_details WHERE property_type = 'apartment' ORDER BY building_value DESC;
SELECT policy_id, start_date, end_date, policy_type FROM policy_details WHERE coverage_amount >= 10000 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM home_insurance_claims;
SELECT * FROM policyholders ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT policy_id, first_name, last_name FROM policyholders WHERE age > 30;
SELECT claim_id, issue_description, claim_status FROM claim_details WHERE claim_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT claim_id, damage_description, damage_cost FROM damage_analysis ORDER BY damage_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM home_insurance_claims;
SELECT policy_id, home_address, claim_date FROM home_insurance_claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM home_insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000;

SELECT pd.first_name, pd.last_name, c.claim_status, da.damage_cost FROM policyholders pd JOIN home_insurance_claims c ON pd.policy_id = c.policy_id JOIN damage_analysis da ON c.claim_id = da.claim_id WHERE c.claim_status = 'Pending';
SELECT DISTINCT ip.policyholder_id, pd.first_name, pd.last_name, ip.witness_id, ip.agency_id FROM implicated_parties ip JOIN policyholders pd ON ip.policyholder_id = pd.policy_id;
